mapper.select: select rv.rating, m2.userName, p.productName, detail.qty, rv.reviewDate, rv.answerNum, rv.answerDate, rv.showReview from review rv JOIN member1 m1 ON rv.memberNum = m1.memberNum JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberNum = m2.memberNum JOIN product p ON rv.productNum = p.productNum JOIN orderDetail detail ON detail.orderDetailNum = rv.orderDetailNum
